Expanding Access to Capital for Rural Job Creators Act
Expanding Access to Capital for Rural Job Creators Act
To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to expand access to capital for rural-area small businesses, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 60 - 0.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Financial Services. H. Rept. 115-531.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 396.

bill.summary:
Expanding Access to Capital for Rural Job Creators Act
(Sec. 2) This bill amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to require the Advocate for Small Business Capital Formation within the Securities and Exchange Commission to report on issues encountered by rural-area small businesses.
